name: EMR
description: Create SOAP charting, digital prescriptions, med certs, lab orders, and compare lab results anytime, anywhere.

name: Advanced Billing
description: Integrate all clinic transactions into a single database with this Billing Management System Module.

name: POS
description: Complements the Inventory and Billing Modules.

name: Chat Box
description: Virtually communicate with your clinic staff.

name: Reports
description: Measure your clinic's performance with real-time data.

name: LIS
description: Communicate with your modern diagnostic machines through HL7 interfacing using this Laboratory Information System (LIS) Module.

name: RIS
description: View DICOM images and imaging reports remotely using this Sonology and Radiology Information System (RIS).

name: Inventory
description: Monitor in-house supplies and over-the-counter products with this Inventory Management System Module built for healthcare facilities.

name: Syncbase
description: The system works even when offline.

name: PME
description: Manage corporate and private APE, PEME, and FME.

name: DPA Guide
description: Step-by-step guide to DPA compliance for doctors and clinics.

name: Awesome Care
description: Get help quickly from our hands-on support team.

name: Specialty Features
description: Activate premium tools for different doctor specializations.
